description: Discard positions if the previous position for same trip is less than X meters from the current one
Adjusts minimum separation proportionally based on speed (ref 100 km/h). Value is added to 100 as base. 0 = disabled (uses fixed distance)
Wait X minutes between positions to create a new trip
Discard positions that do not contain a valid signal
Enable or Disable the public panel of shared devices (/shared)
Add a slug to the /shared path to avoid direct access in the generic URL
